version_description:
==v3.6==
Thank you for your feedback!

In new version:
-Added more Christmas stamps
-Coloring pages improved
-Minor improvements and bug fixed

If there's something you'd like to see in a future update, leave a review or send an email to mail@rsios.com

==v3.9==
In new version:
-Pictures improved
-Minor improvements and bug fixed

If there's something you'd like to see in a future update, leave a review or send an email to mail@rsios.com

- Added new gorgeous images in 7 completely new categories. Warning: after updating all previous images will be lost.
- Added new gradients & pattern palettes
- Added zoom
- Added the ability to add effects and frames to your creations
- Many other improvements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore.

- Added new images category "HairStyle"
- Added new artistic pattern palette "Abstractions"
- Fixed a bug when in some cases the "Unlimited Access" wasn't opened after the purchase
- Improved several frames and effects for images
- Other improvements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore.

- Added new images category "Magic"
- Minor improvements and refinements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore.

- Added new images category "Unicorns" and "Fashion"
- Added new pattern palettes "Bright Lights" and "Shining"
- Introducing new social feature: “Top Artists”! The rating and users position is based on the top five most liked user images during the last month
- Added new picture frames
- Improved several effects
- Minor improvements and refinements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore.

- Added new pattern palettes "Brilliant Glow", “Crystal Lights” and "Diamond Rainbow"
- Added new feature: Pattern Size Tool. You can now change the size of patterns
- Added 3 types of editors choice: Gold, Ruby and Diamond
- Greatly optimized loading coloring images
- Added new images
- Added new 3D effects
- Larger coloring area
- Improved support for iPhoneX
- Minor improvements and refinements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore

- New icon
- Minor improvements and refinements

- Improved several coloring images
- Fixes a bug, when sometimes the patterns took very long time to open

- Added new feature: “Pattern Color Tool”. You can now create even more stylish art by changing the main color of all the pattern palettes
- Minor other improvements and refinements

If you like the app, please take 2 minutes and rate our app in the AppStore

- Improved first pattern effect
- Minor improvements and refinements

- Added new images category "Equestrienne"
- Minor improvements and refinements

- Added new feature "Custom Pattern Color". You can now apply any gradient color to any pattern. If you set the pattern color slider to the rightmost position, the last selected gradient color will be applied to the pattern. Please tell us what you think about this feature!
- Minor improvements and refinements

- Added two new finishing texture effects
- Added new gradient palette
- Minor improvements and refinements

- Added new pattern palette "Behind Glass"
- Productivity and stability improvements
- Minor improvements and refinements

- In this update we improved the primary solid color palette. Now there are more dark color shades to choose from and you can add two new effects to pencils
- Fixed a bug when author's signature was too dark
- Productivity and stability improvements
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Introducing new feature: "Airbrush", now can not only touch to color but you can also draw with any color. Please tell us what do you think about this feature!
- Major productivity and stability improvements when coloring pictures
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Added new images category “Pixel Art”
- Added new finishing mirroring effect
- Increased number of undo steps when coloring
- Improved coloring speed and stability
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Improved finishing effects
- Fixed a bug when the app closed unexpectedly when coloring
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Improved gradients. Now the touch point determines the position of the gradient
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Now you can toggle between coloring modes. In one mode you can only tap to color and scroll with one finger, in the second you can tap to color and draw with any color. You can switch between coloring modes in the settings on the coloring screen
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Fixed several bugs that in rare cases could lead the app to behave unexpectedly
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Added new Christmas pattern palette
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Added new Christmas images
- Other minor improvements and refinements

- Pen tool improvements

- You can now sort by Ruby and Emerald medals in your profile on the iPad
